item_quartz_crystal.name: quartz crystal
item_quartz_crystal.description: A common, semi-precious crystal, cloudy but with a certain charm.

item_tiger_eye.name: tiger eye
item_tiger_eye.description: A gemstone with a silky luster and a golden-brown hue.

item_garnet.name: garnet
item_garnet.description: A deep red gemstone, the size of a small pebble.

item_jade.name: jade
item_jade.description: A smooth, polished stone of a milky green color.

item_sapphire.name: sapphire
item_sapphire.description: A brilliant blue gemstone that seems to capture the light.

item_ruby.name: ruby
item_ruby.description: A fiery red gemstone, cut with many facets.

item_emerald.name: emerald
item_emerald.description: A stunning deep green gemstone, though it has a few minor flaws.

item_diamond.name: diamond
item_diamond.description: A flawless, brilliantly cut diamond of exceptional rarity.

item_shadowquartz.name: shadowquartz
item_shadowquartz.description: A shard of smoky grey quartz that seems to drink the light around it.

item_agate.name: agate
item_agate.description: A common, earthy stone with concentric bands of color.

item_jet.name: jet
item_jet.description: A piece of polished black lignite, deep and lusterous.

item_turquoise.name: turquoise
item_turquoise.description: An opaque, blue-to-green stone, often veined with dark matrix.

item_bloodstone.name: bloodstone
item_bloodstone.description: A dark green jasper with flecks of red, resembling drops of blood.

item_moonstone.name: moonstone
item_moonstone.description: A pearly, opalescent stone that seems to glow with a soft inner light.

item_peridot.name: peridot
item_peridot.description: A vibrant lime-green gemstone, often found near volcanic rock.

item_tourmaline.name: tourmaline
item_tourmaline.description: A crystal that shows different colors when viewed from different angles.

item_pearl.name: pearl
item_pearl.description: A smooth, lustrous pearl, harvested from a river oyster.

item_topaz.name: topaz
item_topaz.description: A silicate mineral, this one a brilliant shade of sunny yellow.

item_aquamarine.name: aquamarine
item_aquamarine.description: A clear, pale blue gemstone that evokes the color of the sea.

item_opal.name: opal
item_opal.description: A beautiful stone that diffracts light to show a shimmering play of colors.

item_spinel.name: spinel
item_spinel.description: A magnificent gemstone, often mistaken for a ruby due to its deep red hue.

item_sunstone.name: sunstone
item_sunstone.description: A fiery orange gemstone that seems to contain captured sunlight.

item_stormstone.name: stormstone
item_stormstone.description: A dark grey gem with veins of yellow that seem to crackle with latent energy.

item_fey_opal.name: fey-opal
item_fey_opal.description: An otherworldly opal whose colors shift in ways that defy the laws of light.

item_star_sapphire.name: star sapphire
item_star_sapphire.description: A deep blue sapphire that exhibits a perfect six-rayed star under light.

item_soulgem.name: soulgem
item_soulgem.description: A flawless black crystal that is unnervingly cold to the touch and seems to drink the light around it. It feels... empty.

item_black_diamond.name: black diamond
item_black_diamond.description: An extremely rare, opaque black diamond of incredible hardness.

item_dragons_eye.name: dragon's eye
item_dragons_eye.description: A legendary gemstone, warm to the touch, with a deep, fiery core that seems to watch you.
